title.native: ババンババンバンバンパイア

description:
When 15-year-old Rihito falls in love, an ancient vampire who craves 18-year-old virgin blood must protect the teen's virginity at all costs.

(Source: Netflix)
hashtag: #ババンババンバンバンパイア

tags.name: Vampire
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a vampire.

tags.name: Male Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is male.

tags.name: Boys' Love
tags.description: Prominently features romance between two males, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Age Gap
tags.description: Prominently features romantic relations between people with a significant age difference.

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

tags.name: Unrequited Love
tags.description: One or more characters are experiencing an unrequited love that may or may not be reciprocated.

tags.name: Love Triangle
tags.description: Centered around romantic feelings between more than two people. Includes all love polygons.

tags.name: Virginity
tags.description: Features a male character who has never had sexual relations (until now).

tags.name: Mixed Gender Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several people, regardless of gender, who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: LGBTQ+ Themes
tags.description: Prominently features characters or themes associated with the LGBTQ+ community, such as sexuality or gender identity.

tags.name: Nudity
tags.description: Features a character wearing no clothing or exposing intimate body parts.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: Urban
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a city.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Delinquents
tags.description: Features characters with a notorious image and attitude, sometimes referred to as "yankees".

tags.name: Acting
tags.description: Centers around actors or the acting industry.

tags.name: Work
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a certain occupation.

tags.name: Teacher
tags.description: Protagonist is an educator, usually in a school setting.

tags.name: Historical
tags.description: Partly or completely set during a real period of world history.

tags.name: Samurai
tags.description: Prominently features warriors of medieval Japanese nobility bound by a code of honor.

tags.name: Revenge
tags.description: Prominently features a character who aims to exact punishment in a resentful or vindictive manner.

title.native: ババンババンバンバンパイア

node.description: He is an art director and supervisor, who was a long time member of Bihou until 2007 when he went to head the background art department in Totonyan. He belongs to the anime production group Neko-Nanban-Tei together with director Watanabe Takashi and his wife Miyata Naomi.

[Website](http://shonan-beach.com/jun/)

A Japanese composer, arranger, music producer and lyricist. He graduated from Tokyo College of Music.

He is an art director and supervisor, who was a long time member of Bihou until 2007 when he went to head the background art department in Totonyan. He belongs to the anime production group Neko-Nanban-Tei together with director Watanabe Takashi and his wife Miyata Naomi.

Freelancer. Recognizable for his bassy and often reverbed sound effects.

Regularly works with [Yoshikazu Iwanami](https://anilist.co/staff/101016/) and [Jin Aketagawa](https://anilist.co/staff/103074/).
